body:
So I watch this guys youtube sometimes https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDLABr8ydF4R4pqr3C9d_JQ/videos

And he makes hacking, screensharing videos etc.
Well yesterday he got a account named "Kevin" and he went to different servers and hacked like that. 

Now for the point. Avicus had some problems today, peoples name changed to Kevin, Staff members getting banned.

Could this "Kevin" guy been hacking this server, well I don't know 
Just thought it was something that could have been related.
body_tagged:

title: Kevin

replies.body:
Probably is. I watch phase clan lots :c cri that he attacked this server!!
Same skin in the video as the guy on the forums, so ya.
Expect avicus exposed!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
And it wasn't today that he got an account named Kevin, it was yesterday!!!

replies.body:
Yes, I watch his youtube a lot but this is not him. Kevin is some MVP hypixel tryhard, that Phase hacked, but the Kevin we know got access to it. Eric, Kyoal and I were talking to him and he said he could get any account. 

I was talking to phase on skype and he said he was not hacking on Avicus.

replies.body: If your password is secure and you don't follow any mysterious links then the only way he can 'hack' your account is exploiting a server glitch to gain information etc.
replies.body_tagged: If your password is secure and you don't follow any mysterious links then the only way he can 'hack' your account is exploiting a server glitch to gain information etc.
